name: OR_PKLST
description: The OR_PKLST table contains OR management system pick lists.

columns.name: PICK_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique internal ID of the pick list record.

columns.name: PICK_LIST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the pick list record.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log record associated with this pick list record.  This is the value derived from PCK item 40 to define an explicit network link to the log ID (ORL) and is only defined if the log exists .
